item.title: 718 Turn off 0 rights able to spawn
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

What you did was make it say this.
if (PLAYER_IS_ADMINISTRATOR) {
TELL_THEM_AN_ERROR.
}

item.title: 718 Turn off 0 rights able to spawn
item.dc:creator: @alext1223 alext1223
item.description:
@alext1223 wrote:

[quote=“matzie, post:2, topic:542742”][quote author=alext1223 link=topic=661617.msg4422295#msg4422295 date=1399055869]
Hello! Im practing my java, and the source I downloaded has a kind of spawn pk server going, and I want it to be a econemy server…
in commands java this is what I have
case “item”:
if (cmd.length < 2) {
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(
“Use: ::item id (optional:amount)”);
return true;
}

How do I put a rights requirement on it?
Thank you!
[/quote]
your players should have a variable called “rights, playerRights, modStatus” something along those lines.
if (c.playerRights > 0) {
//item
}[/quote]

It literally doesn’t though /:
http://puu.sh/8wro6.png

I really dont want to remove ::item
but i don’t see what else I can do ._.

SOOOO, then I tried this.
http://puu.sh/8wtqb.png
Still no luck.

Read full topic
